title: A discourse of proper sacrifice, in way of answer to A.B.C. Jesuite, another anonymus of Rome: whereunto the reason of the now publication, and many observable passages relating to these times are prefixed by way of preface: by Sr. Edvvard Dering Knight and baronet.
author: Dering, Edward, Sir, 1598-1644.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Francis Eglesfield, and are to be sold at the signe of the Marigold in Pauls-churchyard,
